author: Ian O'Riordan
title: Irish Olympians keeping the Sanctuary Runners on the move
description: Group formed in 2018 as a way of marking solidarity for those living in Direct Provision
content:
Its been one of the more muted sporting postponements of the coronavirus pandemic, but in keeping with the spirit of their Saturday morning gathering the Sanctuary Runners havent gone completely silent.
Founded in Cork just over two years ago, with now consi… [+3250 chars]
